1

Labels

LangText
enIATA-APMWG

Description

LangText
enThis Schema is defining the APMWG product taxonomy. It does not describe the features of the products i.e. the parts which form the promise towards the customer but elements which describe products in a more intangible fashion allowing to search faster and better for products

LangText
